changes.reasoning: Tailwind v4 removed the line-clamp utility classes. Replace with inline CSS using -webkit-box and WebkitLineClamp for multi-line text truncation in repository descriptions.

Tailwind v4 prose utilities require the @tailwindcss/typography plugin which is not installed. Replace prose classes with standard Tailwind text styling utilities (text-sm, text-gray-700) to maintain consistent formatting for PR descriptions.
Add indent prop to DiffViewer component to support indented diff display in grouped reasoning sections. This allows diffs to be visually nested under their reasoning headers.

Improve visual hierarchy and styling of reasoning-grouped diffs: use inline backgroundColor for consistency, remove redundant file path headers when indented, add border-blue-200 for visual distinction, and simplify the reasoning header layout by removing commit info badges and decorative bullets.
Add lucide-react dependency to package.json for icon components (Brain icon) used in the UI.
Import Brain icon from lucide-react in components that display reasoning sections (though not yet used in the rendered output).
